segments.text: Why do all girls appear feminine after sophomore year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because they are full-grown . Look at their curvy figures .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel they all talk and behave in a different way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They suddenly become shy when they speak to boys .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Some even do make-up slightly . Are you aware that previous ' small potato ' Ma Xiaoxiao becomes a piece of cheese cake recently ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She is certainly not my kind of girl .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Stop preaching your dream love Marilyn Monroe to me . I know those sexy women are your tastes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are so Platonic . Those naive girls will eventually grow into real women . They can't resist love , and men cannot resist their attraction either .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I appreciate the saying ' Love consists in this , that two solitude protect , border and salute each other . '
segments.speaker: S1
